item.title: Analysis of Joomla CVE-2023-23752
item.description: The Proof of Concept (PoC) for CVE-2023-23752 is available here. Overview CVE-2023-23752 represents a vulnerability in Joomla’s microservice API service, disclosed on February 13, 2023. Discovered by Zewei Zhang from NSFOCUS TIANJI Lab, the vulnerability has been assigned a base score of 5.3 (Medium). It allows unauthorized disclosure of plaintext passwords and Personally Identifiable Information (PII) of users. This article provides an analysis of the vulnerability. The Vulnerability CVE-2023-23752 is characterized by an improper access control flaw that permits unauthorized access to webservice endpoints without authentication.
